WorkItem.ClosedComment: User misconception.Unfortunately no, there is no master list of what models support Boss Handler and what models don't. I hope to do an audit soon that will enforce all target level options to use Boss Handler only
WorkItem.Description:
I'm multiboxing five mages in Cataclysm heroics and I've been looking a way to select right content in Rawr, so the hitcap would be perfect for level 87 bosses.
Not sure if boss handler is built for this, however changing the level there does not affect at all.
 
I have simluated hit rating increase by adding required hit rating to one equipped item, so I reach 17.00% and relative stat values drop hit rating off the list as intended. 
Then if I go and try to reforge items, it still suggests me to reforge stats like mastery, haste and crit rating to hit rating. Even when I am "hit capped".
 
Also, when editing items and adding hit rating to shirts, does not affect. I had Sawbones Shirt equipped with 10000 hit rating on it, re-equipped the shirt but I still
needed hit rating due to spell stats and relative stat values.

Comments.Message: Mage model does not use boss handler at the moment. Use the Fight tab under options instead.
And yes, shirt/tabard are ignored in calculations.
I noticed this is the same for the Cat model (boss handler not active).    Is there a list of models that do and don't use the boss handler?

ahh, reforging works nicely with Fight tab so problem kinda sorted ^^
Tnx Kavan
